title: Jane Street’s Trading Haul Juiced by Surging Bet on Anthropic
description: Jane Street Group’s record haul this year has been boosted by savvy bets on the artificial intelligence boom that are showing up as big gains in its trading results, according to people familiar with the matter.
content:

title: Nvidia CEO Jensen Huang visits Republicans as debate over intensifying AI race rages
description: Nvidia CEO Jensen Huang met separately with President Donald Trump and Republican senators Wednesday as tech executives work to secure favorable federal policies for the artificial intelligence industry, including the limited sale of Nvidia's highly valued computer chips to U.S. rivals like China. Huang's closed-door meeting with Republicans on the…

title: Senators unveil bill to keep Trump from easing curbs on AI chip sales to China
description: A bipartisan group of U.S. senators, including prominent Republican China hawk Tom Cotton, on Thursday unveiled a bill that would block the Trump administration from loosening rules that restrict Beijing's access to artificial intelligence chips for 2.5 years.
content: WASHINGTON, Dec 4 (Reuters) - A bipartisan group of U.S. senators, including prominent Republican China hawk Tom Cotton, on Thursday unveiled a bill that would block the Trump administration from loosening rules that restrict Beijing's access to arti... [1616 chars]

title: Artificial Intelligence: Revolutionizing Every Aspect of Life - REUTERS NEXT-Google executive sees AI search as expansion for web
description: Artificial Intelligence (AI) is rapidly redefining the way we live, work, and interact. No longer confined to the realm of science fiction, AI is now a driving force behind innovations across all sectors— from healthcare and finance to entertainment and manufacturing. Its impact is far-reaching, transforming industries, reshaping economies, and influencing the way we navigate daily life.

title: Can AI be funny? Some comedians embrace AI tools but run own shows
description: Comedians like Jon Lajoie and King Willonius are embracing artificial intelligence tools to help them create humor. They just don't think AI is inherently funny.
content:
By MATT O’BRIEN, Associated Press Technology Writer
A baby and his family dog sit across from each other in a podcast studio.
“Welcome to the talking baby podcast,” says the infant, wearing headphones and sounding like a deep-voiced radio broadcaster... [6746 chars]

title: Lawyers to face regulators after AI was used to prepare legal document
description: Three lawyers will face Australian legal regulators, with one ordered to pay $10,000 in costs, after submitting a legal document prepared with artificial intelligence and found to contain "inaccurate and misleading references".
content:
Three lawyers have been referred to Australian legal regulators after artificial intelligence (AI) was used to prepare a court document with "erroneous citations".
A judgement handed down in Sydney last week by the Federal Circuit and Family Court of... [3091 chars]

title: DeSantis calls for strict oversight of AI in Florida
description: Gov. Ron DeSantis on Dec. 4 unveiled an extensive proposal to impose regulations on artificial intelligence and the data centers that power them.
content:
Florida Gov. Ron DeSantis has proposed an "AI Bill of Rights" to regulate artificial intelligence.
The proposal includes protections for children and consumers from chatbots and deepfakes.
